title: Chicken Fried Rice
tagline: Day-old rice, crispy edges, wok hei
description: Chicken Fried Rice - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Heat wok until smoking. Add 1 tbsp oil. Stir-fry seasoned chicken until cooked. Transfer out.
Add 1 tbsp oil. Scramble eggs, break into pieces. Transfer out.
Add remaining oil. Stir-fry garlic 30 seconds.
Add rice, press flat. Let sit 30 seconds, then stir. Repeat until hot and slightly crispy.
Add peas/carrots, cook 1 minute. Return chicken and eggs. Add soy sauce, toss.
Drizzle with sesame oil, add scallions and white pepper.
notes: Don't stir constantly - let rice crisp.
